thread.title: Barca want Gabon's red-hot Aubameyang: Reports

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Barca want Gabon's red-hot Aubameyang: Reports
text:
Borussia Dortmund striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has made an explosive start to the season in the Bundesliga and some newspapers are reporting that he has caught the eye of several big European clubs including Barcelona.
The Catalan daily El Mundo Deportivo had the Gabon striker on its cover on Monday, announcing he is top of the bill to join Lionel Messi, Luis Suarez and Neymar.
Barcelona have been struggling this season with Messi injured and their three-pronged attack missing a potent member.
The 26-year old Aubameyang has been in terrific form scoring 14 goals in all competitions. His talent, pace and improved accuracy in front of goal makes him one of the hottest marksmen in Europe. Dortmund have not indicated any desire to sell him.
If indeed they do make Barcelona a formal offer they will face stiff competition for him. Reports in England are already talking about a reunion with Jurgen Klopp, his former coach at Dortmund who is now in charge of Liverpool.
Aubameyang joined Dortmund from French side Saint Etienne for 15 million euros in 2013 and is now valued at more than 45 million euros.
